alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 9:25PM MST until December 26 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON MST SUNDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers increasing late tonight through Sunday morning, decreasing Sunday afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches above 7000 feet. Southwest winds gusting from 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Flagstaff. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 2 AM Sunday to noon Sunday: Flagstaff 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
